description.raw:
The propshop needs 4 pictures for each model. This pull-request contains a plugin and ruby script that will automatically generate these images.

I found that OGRE <1.9 does not allow anti-aliasing in texture buffers. I put in the necessary changes to support OGRE 1.9, which will create nicer images. Ogre 1.9 is not mandatory.

To try the ruby script:

`gzprop <model_directory>`

For example:

`gzprop ~/.gazebo/models/pr2`

A tarball should be created in your current directory that contains the model and a set of images in a `meta` subdirectory.

This PR is  [ABI/API compatible](http://gazebosim.org/compat_reports/pr_734.html) with gazebo-2.0. The goal would be to put this into gazebo-2.1.
